Class NightClubMgmtApp.ButtonsHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • NightClubMgmtApp.ButtonsHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActionListener, EventListener
    Enclosing class:
    NightClubMgmtApp

    private class NightClubMgmtApp.ButtonsHandler
extends Object
implements ActionListener
    This Class implemets ActionListener.
    ButtonsHandler listens to the JButton: searchButton, showListButton, clubberButton and deleteButton.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      private ButtonsHandler() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void actionPerformed(ActionEvent event)
      This method is invoked when searchButton, showListButton, clubberButton or deleteButton are pressed.
      private void createClubber()
      This method enables the creation of the objects Person, Soldier and Student through their empty constructors they will be added to the arraylist only after the window visibility will be set to false with help of a WindowListener and the ID doesn't already exist in the arraylist.
      private void deleteClubber(String key)
      This method gives the user an option to delete a clubber with a key which holds data.
      private void searchClubber(String key)
      This method recieves a key and runs through they arraylist to find a match with the method ClubAbstractEntity.match(java.lang.String), if found the entity will set its visibility to true and allow customization and prevent use of the main JFrame until the current frame is closed.
      private void showClubbers()
      This method will show all the clubbers in a JTextArea and add a JScrollPane to it.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ButtonsHandler

        private ButtonsHandler()

    • Method Detail

      • actionPerformed

        public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent event)
        This method is invoked when searchButton, showListButton, clubberButton or deleteButton are pressed.
        The buttons will invoke the following methods:
        searchButton - searchClubber(java.lang.String).
        showListButton - showClubbers().
        clubberButton - createClubber().
        deleteButton - deleteClubber(java.lang.String).
        Specified by:
        actionPerformed in interface ActionListener
        Parameters:
        event - Holds the current event.

      • searchClubber

        private void searchClubber(String key)
        This method recieves a key and runs through they arraylist to find a match with the method ClubAbstractEntity.match(java.lang.String), if found the entity will set its visibility to true and allow customization and prevent use of the main JFrame until the current frame is closed.
        Parameters:
        key - holds data to find in the arraylist.

      • showClubbers

        private void showClubbers()
        This method will show all the clubbers in a JTextArea and add a JScrollPane to it.

      • createClubber

        private void createClubber()
        This method enables the creation of the objects Person, Soldier and Student through their empty constructors they will be added to the arraylist only after the window visibility will be set to false with help of a WindowListener and the ID doesn't already exist in the arraylist.

      • deleteClubber

        private void deleteClubber(String key)
        This method gives the user an option to delete a clubber with a key which holds data.
        Parameters:
        key - holds data to find in the arraylist.
